recommendations: Manu Nair “During my time in SIB, I guess I learnt the most from Abishek. His knowledge about finance and the analysis of the happenings around the world, were truly unique. His professionalism, positive attitude to work, and hard working nature are aspects I admire. I am certain that he will do well in any job, and I wish him success for the future!”

Pankaj Raina “Within a very short span of time Abishek was able to impress me by his methodological ways to solving complex problems. Immaculate with numbers, accuracy in every detail put in and a source of motivation whenever needed, Abishek definitely makes his presence felt at the workplace. A true team player, puts in tireless efforts in every project and the insights he offers as a team member helps us achieve greater quality and consistency in the work we do... Here is wishing you all the luck in your journey”
